body: Tuple values are first-class in the graph, so they are SimpleValues and are captured. This was a bug in the last commit: we shouldn't try to capture other SugaredValues. The reason we create a captured input in getVar is because we are concerned that a future setVar will cause it to be come a loop-carried dependency. For SugaredValues, this case is prevented in setVar (you cannot reassign a sugared value).
